query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM suppliers) as suppliers_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM items) as items_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stockLots) as stock_lots_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchaseOrders) as purchase_orders_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stockAdjustments) as stock_adjustments_count
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 48Whp9Xsv8WPpcd.7572f0004a31 --database hsicTx2PxoLvZwefyscKJs --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM suppliers) as suppliers_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM items) as items_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stockLots) as stock_lots_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchaseOrders) as purchase_orders_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stockAdjustments) as stock_adjustments_count
